DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct 12-week randomized-controlled trial 100 young adult smoker . At week 0 , participant attend three outpatient visit baseline . Each participant randomize one four group : Resistance Training ( RT ) /Nicotine Replacement Therapy ( NRT ) , RT/No NRT , No RT/NRT , No RT/No NRT . Those receive RT work certify personal trainer 3 time per week 12 week 60 minute session . Those receive NRT use nicotine patch daily 12 week call California Smoker 's Helpline smoking cessation counseling . Those control group receive intervention maintain current lifestyle habit . At week 13 , participant return three post-intervention assessment . At week 26 , survey data collect assess change lifestyle habit .
